    • Constructor Detail

      • BouncingBall

        public BouncingBall(int xSpeed,
                    int ySpeed,
                    int radius,
                    javax.swing.JFrame jFrame)
        This constructor takes in the necessary information for the ball to run
        Parameters:
        xSpeed - speed in the x direction the ball moves
        ySpeed - speed in the y direction the ball moves
        radius - radius of the ball
        jFrame - jFrame the ball will be added to, contains Frame size information as well;
